Package ohos.global.configuration

Class DeviceCapability

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.global.configuration.DeviceCapability

  • public class DeviceCapability
extends Object
    Provides the device capability to manage resources.

    You can use ResourceManager.getDeviceCapability() to obtain the device capability and use ResourceManager.updateConfiguration(Configuration, DeviceCapability) to update the device capability.

    Since:
    3
    See Also:
    ResourceManager
